jcr:content.jcr:title: List of municipalities in Ciudad Real

contentheadline.headline: List of municipalities in Ciudad Real

contentrichtext.text: This is a list of the municipalities in the [[provinces of Spain|province]] of [[Ciudad Real (province)|Ciudad Real]] in the [[autonomous community]] of [[Castile–La Mancha]],
